name: Luca_Home_Grey_Leather_Contemporary_Loveseat
reviews: Not comfortable. The arms are to far away from the seating area. But the worst thing is that the leather/naugahyde color does not match in different areas of the love seat.
I needed smaller furniture for a family area - really like this loveseat recliner. the color is soft and a perfect grey.
description:
This modern living room reclining loveseat features the finest
genuine Italian leather upholstery combined with the best designed
leather match material applied to areas of minimal use. European
styling and design - this piece is sure to impress and relax your
friends, family and of course yourself. Loveseat features two
recliners for maximum relaxation.                                          StyleContemporaryMaterialLeather, Synthetic LeatherTypeLoveseatAssemblyAssembledColorGreyFurniture PatternSolid
